Title: Majmua Tus Salawaat By Akbar Hussain
Creator: Syed Akbar Hussain Al Hanafi
Description: â€œMajmua-tus-Salawaat Alal Mujtaba Min Ahadeesil Mustafa â€œ Assalamu alaikum ! In this present Era, I have seen many people rejecting different duroods (salawaat) which are been send upon Holy Prophet (peace be upon him). Â And a Group of People commands strongly without knowledge of hadiths that â€There are No Different Duroods Except Durood-E-Ibraheemâ€. So, I desired to write an authentic book regarding different Duroods which can be a answer to the comands of such illitrate people.Â  Alhamdulillah, With the Help of Almighty Allah , Tawassul Of The Beloved Prophet (peace be upon him) and through the works of Great Muhadditheens, Alhamdulillah I have compiled a book, a compendium of Ahadees in the month of Ramdhan 2013. In this book, Alhamdulillah I collected different types of Duroods from Hadiths. And I named this book as â€œMajmua-tus-Salawaat Alal Mujtaba Min Ahadeesil Mustafa â€ (peace be upon him) . May Allah Azzawajal accept this work and May My Master Our Beloved Prophet (peace be upon him) accept this service of mine. Thank youâ€¦.. Writter : Syed Akbar Hussain Al Hanafi â€œMajmua-tus-Salawaat Alal Mujtaba Min Ahadeesil Mustafa â€œ Â Â  ( Huzoor Sallallahu Alaihi wasallam par Duroodo ka Majmua Ahadees se ) Assalamu Aalikum ! Maine Is Maujooda zamaney me bahot se logo ko dekha Jo kai Duroodo ka inkaar karte hai Jo Nabi-e-pak Sallallahu Alaihi wasallam par bhejey jatey hai. Aur kahtey hai ki koi Durood Sahi Nahi Siwaye Durood-E-Ibrahim ke, toh Maine chaha ke Aisa Rislah likhu Jisme bahot se Durood ho, toh maine Alhamdulillah Ek Aisa Risalah likha Jisme Ahadees-E-Nabawiyah ki Raushni me bahot se duroodo ko jama kiya Aur Maine iska Naam Â  â€œMajmua-tus-Salawaat Alal Mujtaba Min Ahadeesil Mustafa â€œ Â Sallallahu Alaihi wasallam rakha. Allah se Dua hai ke Allah paak Is kitaab ko Allah aur uske RasoolÂ Sallallahu Alaihi wasallam ke chahney walo ke liye Nafa Baksh banayeâ€¦â€¦ Ameen

Title: The Tafseer of Al Imam Al Matureedi
Creator: Abdur Rahman As Sondalaani
Description: This is the complete 10 volume explanation of the Quran by Al Imam Abu Mansoor Al Matureedi (died 333 AH) who, along with Al Imam Abul Hasan Al Ash'ari, is the greatest Imam of Ahlus Sunnah wal Jamaa'ah in speculative theology. These 10 volumes were originally uploaded by Hammaad Muhammad Ash Shinqeeti, may Allah reward him. http://www.aslein.net/showthread.php?t=12937 Alhamdulillah, Who has preseved this treasure for the benefit of the Ummah of Sayyidinaa Muhammad SallAllahu 'alaihi wa sallam.
